text: Anata gata shinko suru mono yo, ware no tekideari, mata anata gata no tekidearu mono o, tomo to shite wa naranai. Anata gata ni atae rareta shinri o kyohi shite iru ni mo kakawarazu, mitsu ni koi o yoseru no ka. Kare-ra wa, anata gata no shu, arra o shinko shite iru to iu riyu de, shito to anata gata o tsuiho shita nodearu. Anata gata wa, ware no yorokobi o negainagara, ware no tame ni seisen ni dekakete inagara,(ippo de) kare-ra ni koi o yoseru no ka. Ware wa anata gata no kakusu koto mo, gen wasu koto mo shitte iru. Anata gata no naka ko no yona koto o suru mono wa, hontoni tadashi michi kara mayoi satta monodearu
